blog.name: rachelundefined
blog.title: RachelUndefined
blog.description:
Who am I? Can anyone really answer that question? I don't know who I am. I'm undefined.

What am I into? My biggest, but by no means only, passion is HP fanfics. My interests are many and varied, and my posts reflect my diversity.

Will our interests correspond? Only you can answer that question. Or will you, like myself, remain undefined?

summary: Bait, a harry potter fanfic | FanFiction
title: Bait, a harry potter fanfic | FanFiction
description:
Title: Bait
Author: Backstage Queen
Fandom: Harry Potter
Ship: Leather and Libraries (Draco/Hermione)

Summary: One-Shot. “Your plan won’t work, you know that right? Harry wont come and save me.” She ended her statement with a tinge of despair, something she couldn’t keep out of her voice. “Silly girl” He replied with a fond smile. “That’s not why you’re here.”

summary:
Ron: I think they're dating
Hermione: Who?
Ron: Harry and Malfoy
Hermione: They've been dating for months
Ron: What??
Hermione:...
body:
Ron: I think they're dating
Hermione: Who?
Ron: Harry and Malfoy
Hermione: They've been dating for months
Ron: What??
Hermione: Oh, come on, haven't you noticed how much they look at each other and hold hands when they think nobody sees them?
Ron: I thought they were fighting about something in their hands!

dialogue.name: Hermione
dialogue.label: Hermione:
dialogue.phrase: Oh, come on, haven't you noticed how much they look at each other and hold hands when they think nobody sees them?

dialogue.name: Ron
dialogue.label: Ron:
dialogue.phrase: I thought they were fighting about something in their hands!

summary: May second, 1998 - years have past since the down fall of the Dark Lord and the wizarding community is still struggling in their...
body:
May second, 1998 - years have past since the down fall of the Dark Lord and the wizarding community is still struggling in their efforts to move on from the terrors that war had caused. But a new generation is taking over; a generation who have known nothing but a time of peace. They have grown up hearing the stories of family and friends murdered by Death Eaters or relatives who will spend the rest of their lives in Azkaban, but they have never lived that life of fear, and they want to ensure they never make the mistakes of their elders.

A movement to eradicate blood supremacy has brought activists together from all over Europe, leaving them with a harsh and unforgiving debate on the best way to ensure equality for all, regardless of blood status. Some are joining politics, pushing for laws to set quotas for how many muggleborn and halfblood citizens must work in different careers and offices. Others want pureblooded witches and wizards out of society all together. The only thing that is certain is this is a time of change and no one is sure just yet if it is for better or worse.

COMING SOON | A LITERATE NEXT GENERATION ROLE PLAY CENTERED ON THE RISE OF MUGGLEBORN RIGHT ACTIVISM IN THE BRITISH WIZARDING COMMUNITY.

summary: New pattern up in my Etsy shop! I couldn’t find any good graphs for a Slytherin symbol to add to like the end of a scarf or...
body:
New pattern up in my Etsy shop! I couldn’t find any good graphs for a Slytherin symbol to add to like the end of a scarf or something after the girl I’m seeing wanted to commission a Slytherin scarf from me. Soooo I went ahead and made my own!

The pattern is for crochet and has written instructions as well, and if you have any questions, feel free to ask me!

(Image only shows a piece of the pattern so as to help prevent theft.)

summary:
COLOR CODED SPEAK  Ϟ 

 welcome to color coded speak! we are a canon only, post war trio era harry potter site. we are set...
caption:
COLOR CODED SPEAK  Ϟ 

welcome to color coded speak! we are a canon only, post war trio era harry potter site. we are set in 2002 and have an underlying political plot; however, we are largely character driven and encourage you to create your own storylines for your own characters.

we have a lot of open canons, as well as popular face claims that you can use! 

rules  ϟ  application   ϟ  face claim  ϟ wanted ads  ϟ  advertise

summary: People be like "when I was younger I wanted a Hogwarts letter lol" bitch If I got my letter now you'd never see me again I'd...

blog.name: slytherdordino
blog.title: SlytherdorDino
blog.description: Gryffindor + Slytherin | K-POP fan | She/her | Straight + Demiromantic | Arrowverse (I love The Flash)

summary: After Harry asked Draco if he wants a gum, then he said no.
body:
After Harry asked Draco if he wants a gum, then he said no.

Draco (to Harry): On second thought, gum would be perfection.


Draco’s thoughts: Gum would be perfection? Could’ve said, “Gum would be nice,” or, “I’ll have a stick,” but no. For me, gum is perfection.

I loathe myself.

reblog.comment:

I loathe myself.

trail.content_raw:
After Harry asked Draco if he wants a gum, then he said no.

Draco (to Harry): On second thought, gum would be perfection.


Draco’s thoughts: Gum would be perfection? Could’ve said, “Gum would be nice,” or, “I’ll have a stick,” but no. For me, gum is perfection.

I loathe myself.
trail.content:
After Harry asked Draco if he wants a gum, then he said no.

Draco (to Harry): On second thought, gum would be perfection.


Draco’s thoughts: Gum would be perfection? Could’ve said, “Gum would be nice,” or, “I’ll have a stick,” but no. For me, gum is perfection.

I loathe myself.

summary:
“This day, the next, a hundred years, it’s nothing.
It’s a heartbeat; you’ll never be ready. 
The only woman whose love you’ve...
body:
“This day, the next, a hundred years, it’s nothing.

It’s a heartbeat; you’ll never be ready.

The only woman whose love you’ve prized

will be snatched from you.”
